short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for finding threads of Adult Content in your Browser History.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
it's History: Your Personal Browser History Analyzer

Discover and manage your digital footprint with "it's History," a powerful browser extension designed to help you take control of your online activities. This innovative tool allows you to:

• Search your browsing history, bookmarks, and downloads using customizable keyword categories
• Identify and manage content related to sensitive topics
• Export your findings for personal record-keeping or analysis
• Easily delete selected items from your browser history, bookmarks, or downloads list

Key Features:
- Customizable search categories (Violence, Gambling, Racism, Adult Content, etc.)
- Multi-keyword search for more accurate results
- Dark mode for comfortable viewing
- Detailed analytics of your search results
- User-friendly interface with intuitive controls

Whether you're concerned about privacy, want to clean up your digital trail, or simply curious about your browsing patterns, "it's History" provides a comprehensive solution. Take charge of your online history today with this essential privacy tool.

Note: This extension respects your privacy and processes all data locally on your device.
